context:
Beads description:
Sidebar navigation component for app shells. Features:
- Icon + text navigation items (icon on left, label on right)
- Collapsible/expandable sections using <details>/<summary>
- Active state with subtle background highlight
- Nested items with indentation (no vertical tree lines)
- Hover states for interactive items
- Light/dark theme support via Graffiti theming system

Reference: Linear-style sidebar nav (see attached image). Uses semantic HTML with nav, details/summary for expandable sections. CSS-only, no JavaScript required for expand/collapse behavior.
